sentences.english: As to non-domestic powers owning large portions of sovereign debt - this is cause for concern.
sentences.chinese: 至於擁有大量國債的非國內債權人，這很值得關注。

sentences.english: Both countries increased their holdings during the preceding 12 months.
sentences.chinese: 在此前12個月內，兩國都增持了美國國債。

sentences.english: Default-insurance prices for Spanis h and Italian government bonds increased.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙和意大利國債的違約保險價格均有所上升。

sentences.english: China has purchased US T-Bonds worth about 900 billion US dollars.
sentences.chinese: 中國已經購買了美國大約9千億美元的長期國債。

sentences.english: They provide much better yields than ordinary Treasuries unless inflation disappears.
sentences.chinese: 它們提供比普通國債更好的收益率，除非通脹消失。

sentences.english: Speculators Õ too believe Treasury yields will rise in the near term.
sentences.chinese: 投機者也相信短期美國國債收益率將會上升。

sentences.english: It announced today that it will buy up to 300 billion dollars in long term Treasury securities over the next six months.
sentences.chinese: 今天宣佈在六個月內購買最高爲三千億的長期國債。

sentences.english: The fund will also start purchasing government debt early next week.
sentences.chinese: 日本央行從下週初開始還會用這筆資金購買國債。

sentences.english: That's more than you'll get from even a 30-year Treasury at the moment.
sentences.chinese: 比那個財政部現在標售的30年期的國債收益都要高。

sentences.english: Short-term Treasury rates continued to stay low Monday.
sentences.chinese: 短期美國國債收益率週一仍維持在低水平。

sentences.english: Sovereign debt is looking wobbly too, especially but not exclusively in emerging markets.
sentences.chinese: 國債看來也在動搖，而且這並不僅在新興市場出現。

sentences.english: Visible Certificates are registered and the holders of these can report any loss directly to the bank.
sentences.chinese: 憑證式國債是記名式的，持有人可以直接向銀行掛失。

sentences.english: Until investorsstop buying US Treasurys, why should Congress change its ways?
sentences.chinese: 既然美國國債還有投資者買，國會爲什麼要改弦更張？

sentences.english: In the past, raising the debt ceiling was routine.
sentences.chinese: 過去提高國債上限是例行公事。

sentences.english: US Treasuries are the safe haven.
sentences.chinese: 美國國債是安全的避風港。

sentences.english: Investors sold bonds issued by triple-A rated France and Austria.
sentences.chinese: 投資者拋售有着AAA評級的法國和奧地利國債。

definition: a loan/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/to provide a loan (e.g. bank)/to raise a loan (from e.g. a bank)
to adjust downwards/to lower (prices, wages etc)
to demote/to pass down to a lower unit
